testcase.name: Susan Kare Iconography › should display Susan Kare icons correctly

failure.message: susan-kare-interactions.spec.js:14:9 should display Susan Kare icons correctly

testcase.failure: [chromium] › susan-kare-interactions.spec.js:14:9 › Susan Kare Iconography › should display Susan Kare icons correctly Error: expect.toBeVisible: Error: strict mode violation: locator('.kare-icon-cart') resolved to 2 elements: 1) aka getByRole('button', { name: 'Agregar al carrito' }) 2) aka locator('.kare-icon-cart.floating-cart-icon') Call log: - Expect "toBeVisible" with timeout 5000ms - waiting for locator('.kare-icon-cart') 14 | test('should display Susan Kare icons correctly', async ({ page }) => { 15 | // Verificar que los iconos Susan Kare están presentes > 16 | await expect(page.locator('.kare-icon-cart')).toBeVisible();
